content.raw:
It's probably a good idea to wait until the posterior pull request is in since this test would ideally test the posterior case as well.

I would probably put a small comment about the GMTK version in the test script somewhere. There should be a better way of doing this but for now I think that's the best solution.

The README/docs need to be updated in general. Right now IIRC the recommended installation for GMTK is the ticket 161-2 branch. In this case (for the test) I don't believe it matters what version as much as there is a record of how to reproduce the results especially if GMTK can potentially change the results significantly enough.
